author: gtcryptoant
title: Cardano NFT Agency
description: The perceived difficulty in using Cardano blockchain because of the coding language is the main barrier of entry that limits new users choosing Cardano.

f6_assessments.q0:
"Hello to the proposal team, I have seen a few issues that need to be addressed with the impact of this proposal, please refer to it for more information.
  -Firstly, the group's way of posing the problem seems to be a bit sketchy and concise, not really getting rid of the idea, as well as not bringing into the heart of the main ideas in this summary.
  - secondly, I have seen a lot of suggestions for using the same solution as yours: seminars, consulting, and advertising management, and those suggestions I see they have tutorials and Their target audience is mainly aimed at artists, developers who have been and are about to develop on the Ethereum ecosystem, thus meeting the requirements of the challenge and having a great impact on the central goal of the project. this great migration, your solution does mention this as opposed to ""While Etherium has the reputation, liquidity and seniority for NFT, Cardano is the KING of utility."" but in the solution Like about group solutions you haven't mentioned anything that directs the focus of the proposal to it.
    -Thirdly, how do you plan to organize seminars on a national or local scale, I have not seen this announcement in the solution presentation.
in your solution presentation I know you saw the potential of NFTs to have a huge impact on our real life in the future and you have a vision to develop them. but regret to tell the team that the focus of this challenge is to map out support advice for Ethereum developers to prepare them for the big migration to Cardano in the not too distant future. in line with the proverb, hope you understand its meaning: "" the heart of the people wanted, just waiting for the opportunity """

f6_assessments.q0:
As the saying in the proposal "Cardano is the KING of utilities" and not everyone knows this advantage of Cardano. Therefore, it is necessary to have a strong and aggressive advertising and marketing campaign to attract the attention of the NFT community.
The solution you come up with matches the challenge.
Necessary for organizing Art and Gadget NFT creation sessions on Cardano for Businesses and Creators. Here developers will be consulted on the development and management of their projects.
There are 2 proposed objects aimed at individuals (B2C), businesses (B2B).
I see that currently NFT is only developed by individuals so developing for a business audience will not be attractive. This is also a potential risk of the project in my opinion.
I support development projects that support individuals
f6_assessments.q1:
Planning to organize consulting and orientation seminars, the need to prepare the consulting content with the staff to prepare the seminars, the consulting team to guide the orientation will greatly affect the feasibility of the project. judgment. I don't see any emphasis on this in the blueprint.
If the goal is free seminars, it is difficult and takes a long time to generate positive cash flow for sustainable development of the project.
The general allocation breakdown budget table has 3 main categories: salary, device, web, and brand.
Holding a seminar where the detailed salary distribution for personnel is only for 2 people within 6 months, the project does not have a plan to pay for the staff in charge of consulting and organizing the workshop?
Budgets and blueprints are not linked.
The team consists of 2 members: 1 person specializing in B2B and 1 person is an artist. So who will be in charge of the B2C segment, this position is currently vacant.
In general, the more feasible the project proposal, the more necessary it is to develop an appropriate personnel budget that is aligned with the detailed goals.
f6_assessments.q2:
Project progress is measured by the number of individuals and businesses appearing in the project proposed by the project, but with construction proposal information, successfully organized seminars receive good feedback from individuals. and business is the most obvious measure of project implementation progress.
Demo web for guests to try to feel the features and advantages, then agree to develop the NFT project on Cardano.
In general, measuring the progress and success of the project is the acceptance of the Cardano blockchain as the optimal and chosen option for NFT development.

f6_assessments.q0: This challenge is intended for projects and individuals who should migrate from Ethereum ecosystem to the Cardano ecosystem. The proposer points out the problem in perceived difficulties in using the Cardano blockchain due to the coding language is the main barrier to entry that limits new users from choosing Cardano then presents a solution to the problem, which is that it will provide complete services (consulting, workshops, project management) specialized in creating artistic and useful NFTs on Cardano for businesses and creators. The idea is great, but this proposal presents a way to attract new users, not users of the Ethereum platform. This proposal with its key metrics and objectives is inconsistent with the stated challenge settings. The proposer presents in detail how this offering will add value to the Cardano ecosystem, but unfortunately this project is not in a challenge where the main task is to transition from Ethereum to Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1: The team transparently introduced itself to the community through the links placed in the proposal, from which we can see that the team has 2 members who have the necessary knowledge and skills to implement this proposal. A budget was also presented, which is acceptable in terms of its amount. The team states in the budget a salary of $24,000! I would love to see what the team will do with that money! A detailed budget breakdown into identifiable items is missing. It would be great if team had an insight into how many hours the team works per day, what is the working hourly rate, what tasks do the team members have? A work plan was created and realistic time frames were set within the work plan could be completed. The team presents possible risks and offers solutions if risks occur.
f6_assessments.q2: A roadmap with milestones was presented. It was also presented what will be measured and how the project can be monitored, but unfortunately this challenge is related to the transition of projects and individuals from the Ethereum ecosystem to the Cardano ecosystem. The team did not elaborate that part in this proposal. If the community follows the settings of this challenge it cannot follow the development and success of this project in any way, because the settings of this proposal are not in line with the challenge settings.

f6_assessments.q0:
-  Yes, I agree that Cardano is growing stronger and stronger. Cardano's successes have so far exceeded the expectations of those interested. However, it is possible that blockchain, or Cardano, is still unfamiliar and difficult to use for newcomers. with the idea of ​​making Cardano NFT Agents more accessible to users is a very good idea.
    
    -  Here I see the proposed topic has raised the problem that is. The difficulty is recognized in using blockchain, which is the main barrier to joining Cardano easily. I find the problem raised by the topic very reasonable, and true to the reality of many people. This proposal, if successful, should be scaled up to make it more accessible to everyone.

  -  The solutions that the group outlined are, will provide a full range of services such as consulting, seminars, project management, different topics used differently for NFT integrating traditional business models. system into Cardano. An agency will provide services that make it easy for users to participate in building on Cardano. I found the solutions that the group raised to be very suitable for solving the problems of the challenge.
   -  In addition, the team also raised the risks that the project may face, which is the failure to attract customers to participate, but the team has not yet shown a way to reduce those risks convincingly. I hope the team can add this.
f6_assessments.q1:
-   As for providing a detailed plan, including progress and milestones. I see the proposed topic has defined a specific timeline that will complete the project in a period of 6 months. and is divided into 2 stages to complete. I think with the timeline as mentioned above is reasonable to complete the tasks set out. there are specific objectives to be achieved in each stage as stated in the proposal. however I see the progress of the project there is no way for the community to track.

   -  In the section provide a detailed budget breakdown. with a total budget of $31,500 requested by the subject. Through review I find all the proposed costs are not reasonable, or in other words, are a bit too much compared to the actual need to cost. I hope the team will reconsider this issue.

   -  The section provides detailed information about the people who will work on the project. I see the proposed topic has 2 members already. assigned specific tasks to each person. Through research, I found that the experience and capacity of the members are good. However, the identity of these two members is not easy for the community to verify.
f6_assessments.q2:
-  With a description of what you will measure to track your project progress. here I see the proposed thread that raised 2 metrics namely, Number of new artists and creators creating their first NFT through our Agency on Cardano. and Number of new business clients we have acquired. I would like to add another indicator that is the feedback statistics from users and businesses, that will help the project work better.

  -  In the description What does the success of this project look like? I see the group has mentioned 2 successes that is, at least 24 artists are introduced after 6 months. Created NFT projects, Songs, poems, etc. and has 6 B2B Customers actively using the Cardano blockchain in their real world business models. I think the above successes are closely related to the challenge.
   -  In the funding section. as this is a new proposal that has not been funded. I hope luck will come to this proposal in the end.

f6_assessments.q0: As reflected by the name of the proposal – Cardano NFT Agency, the main aim of this project is to provide consulting services specializing in NFT creation on Cardano for businesses and creators. Although the ultimate goal of increasing the number of NFT artists entering the Cardano blockchain is based on promoting the advantages of Cardano, I have not seen any descriptions of how to promote NFT artists working on Ethereum to Cardano as required by Challenge to expand or completely move projects that are stuck on Ethereum to Cardano. Since it seems that the target customers of this consulting service will mostly be NFT artists who are in the start-up / preliminary ideation stage and are looking for a suitable space / blockchain to develop instead NFT artists who are having problems with Ethereum are looking for a new blockchain to develop. While there are clear descriptions of the main consulting services, the commitment to diversify the NFT ecosystem for Cardano, the challenges to be faced, and the mitigation measures, I think the link of this proposal with the goal and main indicators of the Challenge is not high.
f6_assessments.q1: The project development plan is easy to understand, there are no technical barriers here as the focus of the plan is mainly on branding and marketing strategies. Regarding the required budget, the cost allocation for project development resources such as equipment, website, etc is obvious. However, the cost allocation for personnel needs to be clearer about the estimated working hours of two members to be able to demonstrate that your work efforts are completely in line with the required budget level given out. Descriptive information about members is clear and verifiable through the attached Linkedin profile provided. We can get a clear idea of ​​what each member's role in this project is and if previous work experience is appropriate. I noticed a close connection between the members' professional skills and work experience with their position in this project.
f6_assessments.q2: The KPIs and milestones have been clearly estimated and are ideal for measuring project success. However, I have yet to see estimates of the number of NFT artists converting from Ethereum to Cardano. In addition, this proposal lacks information about tools/methods to support community project progress tracking such as community reports, blog posts, posts on social platforms.

f6_assessments.q0: As there are great business students and business people who great ideas to improve the cardano ecosystem by integrating with NFT's , but many fail as they don't have much technical knowledge to complete the project, this is one of the barrier that is keeping the business people away from cardano ecosystem , Hence to overcome such aspects the proposer here wants to develop a idea of providing services for Both Business to Creator as well as Business to Business, hence by doing such programs it will help removing doubt surrounding using the Cardano blockchain, hence this proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The task mentioned is not easy to achieve, the proposer's team here wants to provide services for Both Business to Creator and Business to Business , there are chances high number of people of onboarding happens then how will the team find so many project managers and help in the completing the project, However the team consist of members who have been in the Cardano Space NFT ecosystem for 9 months now. and they even have large network of contacts and businesses in the art, music and tourism. so that the member's can use the contacts to make project still more successful, Hence with difficult task to achieve  plan presented it is highly likely this proposal will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2:
The audit has clearly mentioned about providing services for the newly onboarded members/artists to complete their projects and can even help in utilizing the NFT's efficiently, audit has even introduced team members and their experience in NFT ecosystem,
The proposed solution contains all the servics the team wants to provide and each step on how to complete the project.
The audit contains detailed timeline and milestone achieve the project, it even contains well structured timeline to complete the project , with the target of 24 Artists onboarded in 6 months the information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal aims to create a self-sustaining and cash-positive Cardano NFT agency that will provide services to onboard businesses and creators onto the Cardano blockchain. Even if the proposal does not fit perfectly with the campaign guidelines: "Projects who were either planning to or did launch on an EVM-based blockchain deploy in the Cardano ecosystem and can do so easily." This campaign may help to attract many new users from Ethereum to Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal team is composed of Anthony Roberts whose linkedin is accessible on Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/anthony-roberts-491037155/ and May Grabli an artist whose portfolio can be found at: Website: https://www.maygrabli.com/. They also plan to add an accountant and Marketing manager and a young professional from the Plutus pioneer program to the team. As the future workers are not yet known, it is not possible to know whether they will be able to carry out the project without having to rely on the good judgement of the proposers.

Proposers request a budget of 31,500$. This budget is divided into salaries, equipment, website and branding. I think the equipment budget is a bit high, they are requesting $6000 for a laptop and a camera. I understand that the equipment aims to achieve the best possible quality but with a smaller budget you could achieve a more than acceptable quality.
f6_assessments.q2: Metrics to track project progress are based on the number of new NFT projects launched with their agency, the number of new clients, social media growth and one year's profit. This is sufficient to know the development of the project. The projects launched can be consulted publicly and their evolution over time can be observed.

f6_assessments.q0: It is inevitable trend in applying Cardano blockchain in every part of our lives, however limitation in understanding about technical terms is the main barrier for most individuals or businesses or artists in choosing or moving from ETH to Cardano ecosystem. Therefore, I think, it is a pratical and interesting idea from the proposer to provide full services from consultations, workshops, project management specialising in creating Art and Utility NFTs on Cardano for Businesses and Creators. After all, the idea is good and this platform is very necessary for community and for the development of Cardano in the future.
f6_assessments.q1: I love the idea but this part is not good enough for the feasiability of the project. The plan is devide into 3 phrases with 3 months for each phrase, starting from July 2022 to March 2023. However, I think, the information is given in each phrase still quite confused and superficial. As far as I know, they have not have official website and communication channel yet.  For phrase 1, they plan to set up foundation for brand, website and business plan design; but my question is Who will be in charge of this task?. Moreover, they also plan to organize free NFT educational workshops and consultations; however my concern is Will they able to cover the expense when not funded yet? In addition, I would like the proposer to provide KPIs in detail for the project. Regarding the budget, the salary is required for 2 people, and equipment and website cost. My question is who is these 2 people? What is their position? (as there are 3 people are mentioned in your team now). So the information is quite general. Finally, for the team, I think they are all talented and experienced who will be in charge of B2B aspect, leading onboarding creators, and advisory role, however this is a large project which need more positions to be filled such as research, HR, accountant, marketing manager. After all, the presentation of this part need to be better for the feasiability of the project.
f6_assessments.q2: To track the progress of this project, the proposer bases on some key metrics: the number of new artists, businesses, social media growth, and profit in Year 1. I think it's ok but needs to be more detailed: Will the report be published weekly or monthly, how often will they organize their workshops? What are their social media channels? Where could the community check these information? Besides, the proposer also give targeted number of artists and B2B clients onboarded in 6 months. I am not sure whether this goal is good enough for the 6-month period. I think the team need a better presentation and strategy of the project so they could get more support from the community.

f6_assessments.q0:
Your proposal is to provide consulting services, seminars, and project management specialized in creating NFT art and utility on Cardano for businesses and creators, this is a good proposition to grow the Cardano network but in my opinion, you have put the proposal in the wrong challenge, so it makes more sense to leave this proposal to the dApps challenge because:
This challenge (The Great Migration - ETH) is to find ideas that can help dApps and other projects scale or move completely from Ethereum to Cardano easily and quickly, while your proposal is to provide services.
f6_assessments.q1:
Your team is someone who has been in the Cardano NFT community for a while and has a strong understanding of NFT technology and the value it brings to artists creating art.
The group's plan lasts from July 2022 to March 2023 with 3 stages of formation and development, the implementation roadmap of the group's plan is detailed, and the budget table has been broken down to fit each item for the job.
f6_assessments.q2:
The team created metrics for the community to track the progress of the project with parameters such as the number of new artists and creators creating their first NFT, the number of clients, and the profit generated in the year1 along. With the growth of social media presence, this information is basically enough to gauge the progress and success of the proposal.
You have also come up with specific KPIs with 24 referred artists and 6 B2B customers using Cardano, this is clear so that the community can easily account for the performance and results of your actions. the group.

solution: We will provide full services (consultations, workshops, project management) specialising in creating Art and Utility NFTs on Cardano for Businesses and Creators.
experience: We are a team that collectively have 30+ years creating, running, and growing businesses. We have been in the Cardano Space NFT ecosystem for 9 months now. We have a large network of contacts and businesses in the art, music and tourism.
